Asụsụ Kom, Itaŋikom, bụ asụsụ ndị Kom nke Cameroon na-asụ
Shultz 1997a na Shultz 1997b (dị n'ịntanetị) nwere nkọwa zuru oke nke ụtọ asụsụ asụsụ.
Kom bụ asụsụ ụdaolu nwere ụda atọ.

Kom na-eji mkpụrụedemede Latin-script orthography nke mkpụrụedemede 29 dabere na General Alphabet nke asusu Cameroon.  O nwere mkpụrụedemede iri abụọ sitere na ntoala ISO , digraph isii, na mkpụrụedemede atọ pụrụ iche: I a machibidoro iwu, eng (Ŋŋ), na apostrophe
A na-edekwa digraphs ae na oe dị ka ligatures æ na œ, n'otu n'otu.

Okpukpu ogugu na-abụkarị phonemic, ọ bụ ezie na mkpụrụedemede ae, oe, ue, na 意 na-anọchi anya ọdịiche allophonic: akara ụdaume atọ ahu bụ ngwaahịa nke ụdaume coalescence, na apostrophe na-anọchi anya nkwụsị glottal, ụdị mkpụrụedemede ikpeazụ nke /k/

Ọ bụ ezie na Kom nwere ụda ụda olu asatọ, ọ bụ naanị abụọ ka a na-ede akara n'akwụkwọ: a na-eji ụdaume dị ala edere ụdaume (dịka kàe [kæ̀] "anọ"), a na-ejikwa ụdaume dị elu na-ada ada [á] dee ụdaume (e) n'elu ụdaume (karka kâf [kâf] "ogwe aka").
